reviewText: Returning it, video menu isn't fully functional. Poor video quality. I wouldn't really call it 6 exercises either... maybe 6 moves.

This DVD demonstrates six qigong exercises.  It is a supplement to the book, from which the movements can be relatively easily learned.  The DVD is instructional and NOT a workout.  While the description is good, it is unlikely one would watch this more than a few times.

Master Wang is truly amazing. This is the best Qigong DVD available today. I have first hand knowledge of what Master Wang can do through Qigong- for I myself was a person who saw him for healing. Understanding the power behind the healing aspects of Qigong is also described throughout his book as well. By performing these simple exercises daily- I believe you will feel better! Thank you Master Wang!

Looking for ways to reduce stress and anxiety...Qigong is an ancient
exercise for (just like the CD says) for Health, Happiness and Healing
I purchased this for a friend getting ready to do chemotherapy
Melonie Gale MA
LMFT, LPCC, LMHC, NCC
www.melgaletherapy.com
